meanings.definition: A retail store that sells hosiery.
meanings.sent1: I visited the hosieries to buy some new socks.
meanings.sent2: She always finds the best deals on stockings at the hosieries.
meanings.sent3: Why did the socks go to the hosieries? To find their perfect match!
meanings.sent4: The hosieries stood out in the shopping district like a beacon of warmth.
meanings.sent5: The colorful display of hosiery in the hosieries was a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: The goods sold by a hosier.
meanings.sent1: The hosieries displayed a wide variety of socks and stockings.
meanings.sent2: Customers often praise the quality of the hosieries' products.
meanings.sent3: Why did the socks throw a party? To celebrate their arrival at the hosieries!
meanings.sent4: The hosieries' collection of hosiery was a rainbow of comfort.
meanings.sent5: Walking into the hosieries felt like stepping into a world of cozy possibilities.
